metadata.title: Amdesco Captain 5th Birthday 5 Years Old Toddler T-Shirt
features: SIZING - *Fit* runs a little on the small size. You may want to order a size larger for a looser fit. 2T - 12.0" x 15.0" / 3T - 13.0" x 16.0" / 4T - 14.0" x 17.0" / 5T - 15.0" x 18.0" - Size measurements are approximate due to manufacturing variations.

Unisex Toddler Child T-shirts are perfect for both girls and boys. Kids tees 100% Pre-Shrunk Cotton; Athletic Heather Gray is 90/10 Pre-Shrunk Cotton/Polyester blend.Taped shoulder-to-shoulder for durability, Double-needle hemmed bottom and sleeves.
Purchase With Confidence!!! All Garments are designed, printed and shipped from the United States.
Machine wash cold inside out; Non-chlorinated bleach when necessary; Tumble dry on low heat
Perfect gift for all holidays and occasions; Satisfaction is Guaranteed!
description: Amdesco Toddler T-shirts are great for our precious little ones to wear while lounging around the house, heading to a play date with friends, or spending the night with Grandma and Grandpa. These tee shirts are also the perfect gift for any occasion. All Amdesco toddler tees can be worn by both girls and boys, are 100% Pre-Shrunk Cotton (EXCEPT FOR Heather Gray, which is 90/10 Pre-Shrunk Cotton/Polyester blend) and are fully machine washable. Every Amdesco item comes with a 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee, Free Standard Shipping and Free Exchanges. Shop worry free with Amdesco!
